    • getNextInvoiceNumber

      java.lang.Long getNextInvoiceNumber() throws java.sql.SQLException
      Returns:
      next invoice number to assign; that is, one greater than the greatest number already assigned to an invoice + 1 Notice that, in a real deployment, this way to get a new invoice number may produce incorrect values in a concurrent environment because two concurrent threads could get the same number.
      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException
